extension.name: S5 Box
extension.author: Shape5.com
extension.description: Choose from JavaScript or CSS3 powered animations. The S5 Box allows you to display any module in lightbox style popup activated by a class name. It can display up to 10 S5 Box's by simply adding a class name to any HTML element and a module position to your template XML file. Check out the tutorial on http://www.shape5.com/demo/elegance/s5_box/ for more information.

field.label:
Instructions: Use the settings below to alter the width of the S5 Box's be sure to publish a module to each corresponding position for the box to be enabled.

You can use either % or px. To use % simply add a number between 1-100. To use a pixel width add a number greater than 100.

Please visit the following url for a tutorial http://www.shape5.com/demo/elegance/s5_box/

field.name: s5_jsversion
field.label: Powered by
field.description: Choose either jQuery or CSS to power the S5 Box.

field.name: s5_boxeffect
field.label: Effect Style
field.description: Choose the effect style for the S5 Box module when initialized via a user click

field.name: s5_boxspeed
field.label: Effect Speed (CSS only)
field.description: Enter the speed in milliseconds you desire for the effects to transition in. For example you can enter 400 or for 1 second enter in 1000.

field.name: s5_boxminwidth
field.label: Min Width
field.description: You can leave blank but if you don't like how the box's are appearing on smaller resolution screens you can enter a width in pixels here to stop it from shrinking more than you desire. Enter 300 and it will shrink down until it hits a width of 300px

field.name: s5boxwidth1
field.label: S5 Box 1 Width
field.description: Enter the width you would like this S5 Box to show, it will be a percentage of the entire screen so entering '50' will show the box centered with a width of 50% of the entire screen. If you desire a pixel width enter a number higher than 100 and the module will automatically switch to a pixel width layout based on the number you entered.
